reference.title: Resetting Auto-Failover
reference.shortdesc: Auto-failover is reset with the POST /settings/autoFailover/resetCount HTTP method and URI.

section.title: HTTP method and URI
section.p: Resets the number of nodes that Couchbase Server has automatically failed over. A request can be sent to reset the auto-failover number to 0. This is a global setting for all clusters. Authenticated is required to change this value. No parameters are required.

section.title: Example
section.codeblock: POST /settings/autoFailover/resetCount HTTP/1.1 Host: localhost:8091 Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Authorization: Basic YWRtaW46YWRtaW4=

section.title: Response codes
section.codeblock: This endpoint isn't available yet. 401 Unauthorized
